channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Dumped mattress topper overflowing in bin on street, 26th February
item.description:
There is a dumped mattress topper overflowing in a bin that is sitting on the street and blocking the pavement on Tyler Street.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Tyler Street, Greenwich

item.title: Traffic light loose and swaying in the qind, 26th February
item.description:
Sonething is broken with the light as the "head" unit is swaying in the wind. Photo is taken going s/b on Southampton Row just before the junction. It's the light next to the sign in the photo

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Southampton Row, Holborn, Greater London

item.title: Rubbish dumped all the time, 26th February
item.description:
This spot gets rubbish, furniture, food waste & all sorts of disgusting litter dumped here all the time. No matter if things eventually get collected, there is a new dump the next day. Pls clear up Clarence Rd & Narrow Lane & keep them clean & enjoyable.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Clarence Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Several pothole have re-surfaced., 26th February
item.description:
Several pothole have re-surfaced by the bus stop show in the photo,162 Lower Road SE16. They may have been patched before but have become loose/broken again.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lower Road, Rotherhithe, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Household rubbish dumping, 26th February
item.description:
EVERY night the tenants above the shops are dumping bags and bags of horse hold rubbish and leaving it by the post on the pavement outside 42 Anerley Hill. Fixed are then tearing apart the bags and leaving so much mess almost every morning! Please enforce some penalties at least using CCTV to catch offenders.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 42, Anerley Hill, Crystal Palace, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
